entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:37 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
